title: Marry You
lyrics:
[intro] (F) (Gm) (Bb) (F)
 
[chorus]
It’s a (F)beautiful night, we’re looking for something (Gm)dumb to do
Hey (Bb)baby, I think I want to marry you (F)
Is it that (F)look in your eyes, or is it this (Gm)dancing juice?
Who (Bb)cares baby, I think I wanna marry you (F)
 
Well I (F)know this little chapel, on the boulevard, we can (Gm)go (wo-o-o-oh)
No one will (Bb)know (wo-o-o-oh), come (F)on, girl
Who (F)cares if we're trashed, got a pocket full of cash, we can (Gm)blow (wo-o-o-oh)
Shots of pa-(Bb)tron (wo-o-o-oh), and it's (F)on, girl
 
[pre-chorus]
Don't say (F)no, no, no, no-no
Just say (Gm)yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah-yeah
And we'll (Bb)go, go, go, go-go
If you're (F)ready, like I'm ready
 
[chorus]
‘Cause it’s a (F)beautiful night, we’re looking for something (Gm)dumb to do
Hey (Bb)baby, I think I want to marry you (F)
Is it that (F)look in your eyes, or is it this (Gm)dancing juice?
Who (Bb)cares baby, I think I wanna marry you (F)
 
(F)I'll go get a ring, let the choir bells sing, like (Gm)ooh (oo-oo-oo-oo-ooh)
So whatcha wanna (Bb)do (oo-oo-oo-oo-ooh)? Let's just (F)run, girl
(F)If we wake up, and we wanna break up, that's (Gm)cool (oo-oo-oo-oo-ooh)
No, I won't blame (Bb)you (oo-oo-oo-oo-ooh), it was (F)fun, girl
 
[pre-chorus]
Don't say (F)no, no, no, no-no
Just say (Gm)yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah-yeah
And we'll (Bb)go, go, go, go-go
If you're (F)ready, like I'm ready
 
[chorus]
‘Cause it’s a (F)beautiful night, we’re looking for something (Gm)dumb to do
Hey (Bb)baby, I think I want to marry you (F)
Is it that (F)look in your eyes, or is it this (Gm)dancing juice?
Who (Bb)cares baby, I think I wanna marry you (F)
 
[bridge]
Just say I (F)do ooh ooh (Gm)ooh
Tell me right (Bb)now baby, tell me right (F)now baby, baby
Just say I (F)do ooh ooh (Gm)ooh
Tell me right (Bb)now baby, tell me right (F)now baby, baby, oh!
 
[chorus]
‘Cause it’s a (F)beautiful night, we’re looking for something (Gm)dumb to do
Hey (Bb)baby, I think I want to marry you (F)
Is it that (F)look in your eyes, or is it this (Gm)dancing juice?
Who (Bb)cares baby, I think I wanna marry you (F)
(F) [end]
